verses.verse: Sing <S%H7891><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> song; <S%H7892><s%> Sing <S%H7891><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

Sing <S%H7891><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> His name; <S%H8034><s%> Proclaim <S%H1319><s%> good tidings <S%H1319><s%> of His salvation <S%H3444><s%> from day <S%H3117><s%> to day. <S%H3117><s%>
Tell <S%H5608><s%> of His glory <S%H9202><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> His wonderful <S%H6381><s%> deeds <S%H6381><s%> among all <S%H3605><s%> the peoples. <S%H5971><s%>
For great <S%H1419><s%> is the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and greatly <S%H3966><s%> to be praised; <S%H1984><s%> He is to be feared <S%H3372><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> gods. <S%H430><s%>
For all <S%H3605><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%> are idols, <S%H457><s%> But the Lord <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> the heavens. <S%H8064><s%>
Splendor <S%H1935><s%> and majesty <S%H1926><s%> are before <S%H6923><s%> Him, Strength <S%H5797><s%> and beauty <S%H8597><s%> are in His sanctuary. <S%H4720><s%>
Ascribe <S%H3051><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> O families <S%H4940><s%> of the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> Ascribe <S%H3051><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> glory <S%H9202><s%> and strength. <S%H5797><s%>
Ascribe <S%H3051><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> the glory <S%H9202><s%> of His name; <S%H8034><s%> Bring <S%H5375><s%> an offering, <S%H4503><s%> and come <S%H935><s%> into His courts. <S%H2691><s%>
Worship <S%H7812><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> in holy <S%H6944><s%> attire; <S%H1927><s%> Tremble <S%H9123><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Him, all <S%H3605><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

Say <S%H559><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> "The Lord <S%H3068><s%> reigns; <S%H4427><s%> Indeed, <S%H637><s%> the world <S%H8398><s%> is firmly <S%H3559><s%> established, <S%H3559><s%> it will not be moved; <S%H4131><s%> He will judge <S%H1777><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> with equity. <S%H4339><s%>"

Let the heavens <S%H8064><s%> be glad, <S%H8055><s%> and let the earth <S%H776><s%> rejoice; <S%H1523><s%> Let the sea <S%H3220><s%> roar, <S%H7481><s%> and all <S%H4393><s%> it contains; <S%H4393><s%>

Let the field <S%H9583><s%> exult, <S%H5937><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that is in it. Then <S%H227><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the forest <S%H9194><s%> will sing <S%H7442><s%> for joy <S%H7442><s%>

Before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> for He is coming; <S%H935><s%> For He is coming <S%H935><s%> to judge <S%H8199><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%> He will judge <S%H8199><s%> the world <S%H8398><s%> in righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> And the peoples <S%H5971><s%> in His faithfulness. <S%H530><s%>
